name: Charons Adventures
description:
I dont know how many mistakes are still in this build, but I need to sleep :'D

Pls dont break it  :)

Well, enjoy, as this a one-shot never to be looked at again after this jam. Maybe I'll fix some horrible bugs when I can, but the code looks horrid and ist unbelievably unreusable...

Pls dont sue me for forgetting  you in the in game credits:

Kenney:
kenney-fonts

qubodup
Car Engine Loop

congusbongus
Female screams

Lee Barkovich
Robotic mechanic step sounds

Michel Baradari
Gun sounds

Juhani Junkala
Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection

OwlishMedia
Sound Effects Pack

aquinn
Sirens and Alarm Noise

Next time I'll keep track of what file came from where right when I start the project -.-'
